title: Ryan Coogler's Sinners Coming To Blu-Ray On July 8

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

By on May 30, 2025 at 4:55PM PDT

Ryan Coogler's supernatural thriller Sinners is one of the highest-rated movies of 2025, and after a successful box office run, it’s coming 4K Blu-ray on July 8. Preorders are now open the Sinner 4K Blu-ray, which is packed full of bonus features like featurettes, deleted scenes, and a glimpse into how the movie’s excellent score was created. The steelbook version is currently sold out, but both 4K Blu-ray and Blu-ray versions are up for grabs.

Sinners 4K Blu-ray

$30 | Releases July 8

This version of Sinners gets you a 4K Blu-ray and digital copy of the hit film. Note that the 4K Blu-ray and standard Blu-ray versions are both listed for $30, but we expect prices will change before they're released on July 8. Preordering at Amazon means you won’t be charged until the item ships, and you’ll be eligible for any price cuts between now and launch.

Sinners Bonus Features

Regardless of which format you choose, you’ll get the same list of bonus features. It’s a pretty impressive lineup, featuring multiple behind-the-scenes content that dive deeper into the film's terrifying universe. Here's a look at everything included:

  • Dancing with the Devil: The Making of Sinners
  • Blues in the Night: The Music of Sinners
  • Thicker Than Blood: Becoming the Smokestack Twins
  • Spirits of the Deep South
  • Wages of Sin: The Creature FX of Sinners
  • Deleted Scenes

Sinners was directed by Ryan Coogler of Black Panther fame and stars Michael B. Jordan in dual roles as the twins Smoke and Stack Moore. It follows the twins' return to Mississippi in 1932 after spending time in Chicago--only to find a supernatural threat haunting their every step. The film has earned both high critical reviews and financial success at the box office, grossing around $340 million worldwide.

There are plenty of other great Blu-ray deals right now, including discounts on several other Michael B. Jordan films like 4K versions of Creed and both sequels. You’ll also find preorders for re-releases of popular horror flicks like I Know What You Did Last Summer and Until Dawn, both of which are excellent companions for the supernatural scares of Sinners. Check the list below for a few of our favorites.

More Blu-ray Deals

  • Captain America: Brave New World (4K) -- $30 ($50)
  • Creed (4K) -- $15
  • Creed 2 (4K) -- $15 ($25)
  • Creed 3 (4K) -- $18
  • I Know What You Did Last Summer (4K Steelbook) -- $40 ($56) | Releases June 24
  • Just Mercy (4K Blu-ray) -- $16.49 ($25)
  • Until Dawn (4K Blu-ray) -- $50 | Releases July 8
